profile_positions.description:
As a self employed I like to offer my help in teaching/training/coaching of children and adults, in a wide range of fields surrounding sustainability. 

Since 2020 I have been longer periods in Ukraine, to volunteer in Kharkiv at the university teaching English speaking skills while talking about subjects that improve confidence, methods of learning and other future skills. After the war I have been teaching in Ivano Frankivsk for a university (English), a primary school (German) and organizing workshops for UNICEF

Some successes so far are:
#Awesome kledingruilatelier; share the coordination of a clothing recycling / repair / centre, where we want all people to have access to good clothing, while helping the volunteers get back on their feet. Many of my interests and skills connect together here for me to learn how to manage, coach, inspire and build a business better.

Edulin-Q: offering guest lectures to secondary and middle professional education (MBO) classes on subject that have impact. Topics include; Blood-, and organdonation, confidence & social media, menstruation.

Korein Groep; organise several big events (100 children per afternoon), programs of workshops (12 kids), and trainings/presentations for employees. I like working with this company since they have an open minded view about children development and appreciate my low impact/high creativity activities.

The Hub Eindhoven for Expats; train, guide and supervise the volunteers who were working to keep the community centre for expats running for this amazing initiative. I've been supporting them also as volunteer for many years, just after the startup years. As it's very important for a city to welcome all these new individuals coming for their new home.

profile_positions.description:
As I experienced this wonderful way of meeting people and getting to know their deepest intentions and opinions, I had to join this. The 'Dialogue' is based on the method Appreciative Inquiry. 
In short, it's random people coming together who are talking about a set theme, in which there are 4 stages; introduction, experiences, dreams and do. This all while taking in account the 'rules' of the Dialogue; respect to each other, postpone judgements and research them while listening closely to each other. 

This event has improved my understanding of the stories people are hiding from others, but which do explain so much about the hopes and troubles we all share. My duties are to guard the values of the Dialogue and to keep the talk flowing. Mostly I guide groups in November, but also I am asked several other times during the year.
profile_positions.title: Talk guide / supervisor 'Day of the Dialogue

profile_positions.description:
I was hired by the Korein group to help them in becoming a more sustainable organisation and after doing so, I initiated and assisted the project 'We Care' to make people, planet & profit (purpose) the backbone of any decision making. While including as many employees, children and partners as was possible to get a 'green wave' going.

In my two years I achieved and learnt the following things:

- Introducing the sustainability program/workshops and meeting place at a big congress - after 5 while inspiring and promoting a lot of different kinds of sustainability, and in doing so received a lot of sustainable ideas & input from 243 of the 650 attendants (voluntary input though attractive 'wishing tree' in the Evoluon.
- Recruiting 15 employees for the formation of two workgroups which were to make a plan and implement sustainable actions in the company (bottom-up mostly). 
- Organised last minute a (subsidised) electronic waste race between 60 locations in the company, in which about a 1000 children participated to collect over 13.000 electronic devices in 4 weeks. 
- Instead of a thick year report on the sustainability, I made an infographic (long visual poster) which appealed more to our employees, customers and partners. Also it utilised the talents & enthusiasm of some communication employees.
- Upon deciding to leave I made, together with the previous input from employees and a board member / workgroup chairmen, key strategic subject about sustainability, which were accepted by the board and all the divisions directors as key policy plans from 2017.
profile_positions.title: Projectleader Sustainability

profile_positions.description:
As part of a desire to live more sustainable, I joined the innovative project 'Green Renters'of the building corporation Woonbedrijf. In this project the building corporation invited people to sign up as renters, before the houses and appartments were built in Genderdal. After about 55 households signed up, we had many workshop and meeting during the year to decide together how we want to live and how we can be sustainable together as a group. After time the project evolved and more things became clear. However the methods of deciding have changed during time, because it is not easy to decide things with 55 strong passionate people. From februari 2014 we are using the 'Sociocratic' method.

More information about this project (in Dutch):https://www.woonbedrijf.com/Nieuws/Artikel-598/

Function: Chairman cluster Integration
As many things needed to be worked out, we formed cluster (or circles) of different subjects. Before I participated in the cluster which handled the interior of the appartments and flats. After a change in method I decided to be the chairman of the interesting cluster of Integration.

In this cluster our duties are:
- decide what the criteria will be for allowing new 'green' renters to join the complex
- decide what the protocols will be for allowing present renters to move from an appartment to a house
- how to make make sure / stimulate present renters to stay green and become more green/social
- how to promote a sustainable way of living to the surrounding neighbourhoods

My duties are:
- Refer questions from the members of the cluster Integration and the upper laying central circle from top down and down up.
- Manage deadlines and todo-lists
- Maintain the overview and review all the minuter (notulen)

As of December 2014 I am the chairman of the 'outside-area' (buitenruimte)
profile_positions.title: Chairman (kartrekker) cluster Integration & outer-area of project Green Renters (Groene huurders)

profile_positions.description:
LETS Eindhoven stands for Local Eindhoven Talents System (translated).

It is an association of people who come together and try to exchange talents in a way where everyone wins. For example, I like to fix bikes and do little construction chores. So I offer these talents to someone else who needs them and in return I can ask another talent from another member to do for me.

To help this association get more known and modern I help with:

- Advising about communication / marketing etc
- Setting up a facebookpage and maintaining it.http://www.facebook.com/Letseindhoven
- Promoting LETS at events by handing out flyers and explaining
profile_positions.title: Communications Advisor and webmaster Facebookpage

profile_positions.description:
As I experienced myself how hard it can be for people to feel at home in another country and to support our expats and the local council of Eindhoven in this initiative, I decided to share my time and hands in this heartwarming enterprise. 

My privileges here are:
- as of April 2017 I also took on the duty to plan the shifts, inform the bar staff and train new bartenders. 
- being a moderator in the Dutch conversation lessons on Wednesday mornings.
- welcoming, socializing and advising expats 
- doing barshifts for events and other activities
- helping out with interior construction to make the place look better and more functional
- attending workshops about and constructing/maintaining a innovative roofgarden

I do this to get inspired with life-stories of other people, hearing their challenges as they are trying to overtake them, And feeling useful by making them feel at home and helping them find their way around Eindhoven
profile_positions.title: Bar manager, Volunteer teacher Dutch conversation, barshifts, construction and roofgarden
